hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/ksh
cd /opt/build/scripts
#EXIST_VERS=`./check_dbversions.sh -a ops-dt-domain -e scrum1` VERSION=`./check_dbversions.sh -a ops-dt-domain -e devint`
print Gathering build version to be deployed print -------------------------------------- print print Deploying version ${VERSION} print print print print Beginning Rebuild from scratch for db to latest package version ${VERSION} print ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai04 ops-dt stop /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai04 dce-agent-001 stop
./kill_dbsessions.sh -a ops-dt-domain -e scrum3
cd /opt/checkouts/ops-dt-domain/grails-app/migrations/cisys
echo "@genUser.scrum3.sql;" | sqlplus -s 'cm_system/oracle123@(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=10.13.18.121)(PORT=1522)))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVICE_NAME=scrum003)))'
STATUS=${?} if [[ ${STATUS} != "0" ]]; then exit ${STATUS} fi
cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts
./deployRebuildDb.sh -a ops-dt-domain -t ops-dt-domain -i ops-dt -r ${VERSION} -e scrum3 -j "jdbc:oracle:thin:@10.13.18.121:1522:scrum003" -p SC3_OPS_DT -u SC3_OPS_DT -v
/opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai04 ops-dt start /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai04 dce-agent-001 start
